column4: I just created a DVD Video with dvdauthor. How do I burn that to DVD? Just drag the folder over to a blank? Or do I need some DVD burning app to write it properly?
you can use k3b to do it. Create a DVD Video project and drag the older in.
there might be gnome-based CD burning tools that'll do it too, but personally I like k3b.
Ok, thanks. I'd rather not have KDE libs taking up space for just one app if I don't have to.
